title: Positions for the Bedroom
desc: What?s your position on great sex? In this workshop we?ll cover the best positions for G-spot bliss, oral sex, and feel good fun, whether you?re flying solo or with a partner. Don?t worry; flexibility isn?t a prerequisite for great sex. General Information Doors open for the workshop at 7:15.? The workshop starts at 7:30 and runs until 9:30 with a 15 minute break in the middle.? The store is open for individual questions and private shopping for half an hour after the event. Babeland workshops are open to people of all genders and sexualities, individually, in couples, or in groups.? You must be over 18 to come to the workshops or store. Babeland SOHO is wheelchair accessible. If you?re writing about a Babeland workshop or event for a media outlet, please contact? press@babeland.com ? Cancellation Please remember that others may be waiting for an opening in the workshop you have registered for.? If you must cancel, please notify Babeland at least 48 hours prior to the workshop and you will receive a Babeland Gift Card, less a $10 cancellation fee per ticket.? Cancellations made with less than 48 hours' notice are not eligible to receive a gift card.? A full refund will be issued to you only in the unlikely event that Babeland cancels a workshop. To cancel your ticket more than 48 hours in advance? for the gift card minus the transaction fee,? email avital@babeland.com.? It may take up to 3 business days to receive a reply, but we will register the date the cancellation was sent.
